metadata.title: CVE-2019-7338 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.description: Self - Stored XSS exists in ZoneMinder through 1.32.3, allowing an attacker to execute HTML or JavaScript code in the view 'group' as it insecurely prints the 'Group Name' value on the web page without applying any proper filtration.

criterions.comment: zoneminder package in impish is affected and needs fixing.
